--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Yan, Crossroads transformed into sword and shield mode, and 
> launched himself at the bum to be caught. (and he said some stuff 
> to him as well) =)
> 
> 
> On 2 Jun 2001, at 22:13, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> 
> > :-)
> > 
> > ::::
> > 
> > The bot looks down for a second at Dogged's pressent state, and then
> > walks forward, stepping on the Cybrat. His scanners work on finding a
> > new target.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Dogged looked at the bums chest, he'd thrown his hardest punch and
> > > barely left a scratch that was already beginning to repair itself.
> > > He sensed a shadow hovering over him. "Oh SH..." his thoughts were
> > > cut off by a fist slamming down on his head forcing him to the
> > > ground. (This might be moding but I think you'll like it.) The bums
> > > fist continued downward striking the ground, Dogged still between
> > > the fist and the pavement. When the fist raised Doggeds crushed body
> > > lay with only it's feet fully intact and hanging out of the hole.
> > > Sparks flashed from the rest of it as all motor functions ceased.
